## Docs checklist
- [ ] This PR is **docs/spec only** (no code changes expected in this repo)
- [ ] Document header updated: `Status` / `Phase` / `Last-Updated` / `Depends-On` (if applicable)
- [ ] If adding a new doc, I linked it from `docs/README.md` (or root README if used as entry)
- [ ] Phase 0 Contracts are **referenced by link** (no duplicated rules copied into other docs)
- [ ] If this changes a decision (“why”), I added/updated an ADR in `docs/adr/`
- [ ] Terminology is consistent with glossary/app-map (no new ambiguous terms)
- [ ] Risk/Impact noted (who/what might be affected, even if “none”)
- [ ] (Optional) Follow-ups captured as TODOs in the relevant doc (not in chat)
